## Research Posters
<a href="path_to_poster1.pdf" target="_blank">Poster 1</a><br/>
<a href="path_to_poster2.pdf" target="_blank">Poster 2</a><br/>

library(httr)
library(jsonlite)

orcid <- "0000-0002-7709-6595"

response <- GET(paste0("https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/", orcid, "/works"),
                add_headers(Accept = "application/json"))
                
publications <- fromJSON(content(response, "text"))$group

## Display Publications
for (pub in publications) {
  pub_title <- pub$'work-summary'[[1]]$title$title$value
  pub_url <- pub$'work-summary'[[1]]$url$value
  cat(paste0("<a href='", pub_url, "' target='_blank'>", pub_title, "</a><br/>"))
}
